page.title: 11PLANT NURSERIES
page.content: The three nurseries in{Martin {Hussingtree}are{Pamern Nurseries, {Emwood Nurseries}and{Lloyd Nurseries. Pamern Nursery has been in Martin Hussingtree for well over forty years and employs two part time workers. Their main crops are lettuces and chrysanthemums and their best season for selling falls between April and July.They sell both wholesale and retail.Emwood and Lloyd Nurseries are not quite so old.They have only been in Martin Hussingtree for sixteen years and were once one large nursery but have now been separated. The main crops are lettuces,tomatoes and climbing plants which are all sold wholesale and retail.
